text: Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad ! Be strong,
Be brave,
Be smart,
Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad
“Well that should do it, Babies!”
“I thought we were doing Jack-O-Lanterns this year, Ben?”
“Yeah and it’s not even scary!”
“Jack-O-Lanterns are too scary! How are you supposed to get candy if you scare everyone away?”
Hahahaha
“I’m so excited for the Halloween Trick-Or-Treat festival tomorrow!”
“Where are our Lil’Capers?”
“Hello Babies! I know you all are very excited for tomorrow’s festival; however, there is a slight problem.
The candy in the mall has gone missing. Not even a wrapper has been left behind.
The candy store owner has some information for you. Time for you to power up, Bottle Squad team!”
“Ba-Ba-Boom! We’re ready to zoom!”
“The power went out, then once it was back on, all of the candy was gone!”
“Looks like we’re off to the power room! We could find some clues in there leading us to the culprits!”
“Let’s go!”
“Guys! Over here!”
“What does it say?”
“Hello,

To find the candy which you seek,
Look for a treehouse that looks old and bleak.

This treehouse is located two miles away,
From this very mall, where the candy once lay.
You must hurry along young one, I know it sounds strange.
But if you’re not there by sunset, its location will change.”
“Sounds like we have to get all of the candy back before tonight, squad!”
“Let’s fly up above the mall to look for it!”
“Guys! We need to hurry! The sun is setting!”
“I see a treehouse! It looks old and bleak!”
“And… using my super smarts, I can see that it’s two miles away, exactly!!”
What would we do without you two?”
“We wouldn’t hardly be a team! Haha! Let’s head that way guys!”
“Yeesh! This place gives me the creeps!”
“I’m glad I’m not the only one!”
“Awh! Quit acting like a bunch of Babies!”
“Uhm…
We ARE babies!”
“Good point! Have no fear! Becca is here! I’ll go check it out!”
“We have to go save her!!”
“TRICK OR TREEEAAAT!!!”
“You guys are the thieves?!”
“Did the candy shop salesman help?”
“Ah ha! The candy wasn’t stolen! Our mall wanted to pull the best Halloween Hoax Ever..
“Well I guess we got our trick! Now where’s my treat?!
“If you need our help, you can count on us!
That’s our Ba-Ba-Promise to you!
Have a Happy Halloween everyone!”
